name: build-automation-frontend
description: Front-end for SolarSPELL build automation using ReactJS

scripts.build: npm run-script clean; webpack --mode=production && cp -r dist/ ../content_management/static/
scripts.build-dev: npm run-script clean; webpack --mode=development && cp -r dist/ ../content_management/static/

author: School for the Future of Innovation in Society, Arizona State University.
